Classes in com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps used by com.chuchro.ucbx.javax4362.craps
Bet
          This abstract class is the super class of all Bet objects; each will extend Bet, or another bet object that extends Bet (ad infinitum)
Bet.BetStatus
          Enumerates the different states a bet can be in at any given time.
Dice
          This class represents the pair of dice that are used in a craps game.
Die
          Represents a single die to be used in a craps game.
Die.DieNumber
          Valid values of the six sides of a die, as strings.
DontOddsBet.DontOddsBetInfo
          Inner class to hold Don't Odds bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
DontPassBet
          Don't Pass bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
Game
          This class represents a craps game, absent any of the wagering that a player may make for, against, or about the game.
Game.GameStatus
          Enumeration of all of the valid game states/statuses.
LineBet
          This abstract class represents all types of bets that may require multiple rolls to be determined.
LineOddsBet.LineOddsBetInfo
          Inner class to hold Line Odds bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
OddsBet
          An OddsBet is attached to any LineBet type and is (optionally) set after the point of the line bet is set.
PassLineBet
          Pass Line bet for the come out roll of a craps game.
PlaceBet.PlaceBetInfo
          Inner class to hold Place bet information for all of the different Place bet types.
PlaceBet.PlaceBetType
          All valid Place bet types
PropositionBet.PropositionBetInfo
          Inner class to hold Proposition bet information for all of the different Proposition bet types.
PropositionBet.PropositionBetType
          All valid Proposition Bet Types
Session
          Represents a players session at this virtual craps table.
